entry.title: Joytech eGrip Replacement Coils
entry.summary:
Vendor: joytech
Type:
Price: 7.50

The construction of the eGrip CS head is completely different compared to other Joyetech atomizer heads, so it only works with select devices. It has a resistance of 1.5Ω. Note: It can work under high voltage and wattage. (3.5v - 5.5v)

Changing eGrip Coils: To begin, simply unscrew the bottom cap with a coin. The atomizer head will be located on the base of that bottom cap. Twist/Unscrew the atomizer head and replace it with a fresh new one.

entry.title: Uwell Crown 2 Replacement Coil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Uwell
Type:
Price: 10.00

Uwell Crown 2 Replacement Coil Heads – 0.25 ohms 

100% Genuine Uwell.  Dual parallel wrapped vertical coils with low sub-ohm 0.25 ohm resistance.  Unique bullet-shape means positive connector is a cone which allows for more direct airflow and allows the coil to heat up more evenly.  Produces awesome clouds, great flavour and are long lasting.  New Ultra-Smooth Airflow Design.  High wattage operating range (from 60W to 100W).  Vertical design for best capillary action and greater wick saturation.  Imported organic cotton.

Fits the Uwell Crown 2 Sub-Ohm Tank

entry.title: VOCC-T Coils
entry.summary:
Vendor: KANGER TECH
Type:
Price: 9.50

(*EVOD 2, TOPTANK EVOD*) | 5-pack

Upgraded VOCC-T (Vertical Organic Cotton Coil – Top) Replacement Dual Coils. For your EVOD, EVOD 2, TopTank EVOD, Protank 3, TopTank EMOW, and Aerotank.

Kanger has released these coils along with the new Top Evod, the new top-filling pen style unit.  These new coil heads fit all of the same tanks as the previous coil version, but the VOCC-T are designed to work best with the Top Evod and Top Emow. 

The Authentic Kangertech Dual Coil 1.5 ohm Replacement Pack comes with:

5x – Stainless steel dual coil units (1.5 ohm)

entry.title: Yocan Cerum Coils
entry.summary:
Vendor: Yocan
Type:
Price: 10.00

This is a 5 pack of ceramic donut coils for your Yocan Cerum.  These coils have a resistance of 0.8ohm, quick heat up time and will provide clean tasty hits and big vapour. The air inlets are placed on the sides of the ceramic cup, which avoids the wax leaking from the bottom onto the coil. Rated for 15-25W.

entry.title: Coil Master 521 mini V2 OHM meter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Coil Master
Type: OHM reader
Price: 10.00

Driven by a single 18650 battery, Coil Master 521 mini V2 is a handy compact device for all vapers.
It is a multi-functional device that acts as an ohm meter, voltage drop checker, rebuilding station and firing test station.
The 521 mini V2 is able to measure the resistance down to 0.05 ohm, and dry fire their coils down to 0.1 ohm as well.
Reverse battery protection and short circuit protection are also built in for safty use.

Features
– Ohm meter
– Coil rebuilding deck
– Coil burning
– Reverse battery protection
– Short circuit protection
– Battery out put voltage testing
– PCB Heat protection

Specification
– Resistance Measuring Range: 0.05-9.9ohm(Error±0.05ohm)
– Resistance rate: 0.1ohm
– Connection: 510 threaded with spring loaded pin
– Battery: Single 18650 battery driven (Battery is not included)

General specifications
Dimension: 80mm x 80mm x 28mm
Weight: 80g
Housing material: ABS

Packing
1x User Manual
1x 521 Mini V2

entry.title: Vandy Vape Pulse BF 80W Box Mod
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vandy Vape
Type:
Price: 20.00

The Vandy Vape Pulse BF 80W Box Mod is made in collaboration with Tony B. to produce a lightweight, regulated squonk device utilizing Vandy Vape's proprietary chipset with 80W of maximum output and customizable temperature control settings.  A beautiful masterpiece catering to the rebuildable segment with a high-performance and fully regulated bottom-feeding box mod. The Pulse BF 80W is equipped with its own proprietary chipset, capable of firing up to 80W with full temperature control suite such as customizable curve output adjustments. The Pulse BF Regulated Mod can be utilized with a single 18650 battery with an included adapter or the longer-lasting 20700 battery for added versatility (batteries sold separately). The Pulse BF 80W implements interchangeable panels with beautiful designs ranging from carbon fiber to visually-striking resin-dyed colourways. The 8mL food-grade silicone squonk bottle can be assessed by removing the panel, offering an ergonomic experience when paired with today's top BF RDA’s.


Kit includes:
1x Pulse BF 80W Box Mod
1x 8mL Silicone Squonk Bottle
1x MicroUSB Cable
Instructional Manua

 

Features

  • Dimensions - 82mm by 54mm by 25.9mm

  • Vandy Vape's Advanced Chipset

  • Single High-Amp 20700 Batteries - Not

  • Included

  • Optional Single 18650 Platform - Adapter Included

  • Bottom-Feeding Squonk Design - 8mL Squeeze Bottle

  • Wattage Output Range: 5-80W

  • Voltage Output Range: 0-8.5V

  • Min Atomizer Resistance: 0.05ohm

  • Temperature Control Range: 200-600F

  • Supports Ni200 Nickel, Titanium, and Stainless Steel Heating Elements

  • Comprehensive TCR Adjustments

  • User Defined Temperature Control Mode

  • User Defined TC Curve Set Mode

  • Lightweight Nylon & ABS Construction

  • Intuitive 0.91 Inch OLED Display

  • Interchangeable Dual Magnetic Battery Panels

  • Tactile Firing Button

  • Dual Adjustment Buttons

  • Short Circuit Protection

  • Over-Heating Protection

  • Over-Current Protection

  • Overtime Protection

  • Open Circuit Protection

  • Low Battery Warning

  • MicroUSB Port - 1.5A Max Charge Current

  • Firmware Upgradeable

  • Squonk-Ready 510 Connection - Anti Leaking Securement

  • Carbon Fiber - Full Black, Black / Silver

  • Resin - Lava Red, Fantastic Blue, Seaweed Green, Aurora Rainbow
